section: *HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements including a database for medical dispatch personal & product service as needed, including activity information, data storage and backup. provided by three qualified assigned Borrowmoney.com, inc. employees/personal
explanation: The asterisk is generally used as a reference to another part of the document. There is no reference for this section of the document.

section: The exclusive purpose of the Venture (the "Purpose") will be IT Development. internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service. This purpose may be changed at any time at the discretion of BorrowMoney.com, inc.
explanation: The use of 'internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service' is ambigious and does not follow normal sentence structure. The sentence is unclear and poorly written.

section: The exclusive purpose of the Venture (the "Purpose") will be IT Development. internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service. This purpose may be changed at any time at the discretion of BorrowMoney.com, inc.
explanation: The purpose of the joint venture is very broad. The fact that this may be changed at any time at the discretion of BorrowMoney.com, inc gives BorrowMoney.com, inc unilateral authority to redefine the venture's purpose, potentially against the interests of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go. This lack of mutual control over the core purpose of the venture creates an imbalance and potential for disputes.

section: Any vote required by the Members will be determined such that each Member receives one vote, however, BorrowMoney.com, inc.'s vote will carry twice the weight of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's vote.
explanation: This section creates an imbalance in the voting power. While each member technically receives one vote, BorrowMoney.com, inc.'s vote is weighted twice as much, giving them significantly more influence in decision-making. This could lead to decisions that are not in the best interest of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go and creates a power dynamic that is not equal.

section: This Agreement may be amended with the consent of BorrowMoney.com, inc., notwithstanding any objection from JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go.
explanation: This clause grants BorrowMoney.com, Inc. unilateral power to amend the agreement, regardless of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's objections. This fundamentally undermines the principle of mutual consent in contract modifications, rendering JVLS, LLC's agreement effectively non-binding in the face of BorrowMoney.com, Inc.'s will. This creates a significant imbalance and could be deemed unconscionable.

section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc 1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty* $3,500,000.00 USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: The language used to describe JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go contribution is unclear and ambigious. The description of 'From Monthly Government, City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue' makes it unclear on the actual contribution and does not make sense.

section: Duties of Members may be amended, from time to time, by decision of the Members, provided that the Members' interests are not affected except with the unanimous consent of the Members.
explanation: This statement is contradictory. Duties of the Members may be amended from time to time, but then it states that the unanimous consent of the members must approve the change. Both statements contradict one another.
